name: function-tools
readme: [![view on npm](http://img.shields.io/npm/v/function-tools.svg)](https://www.npmjs.org/package/function-tools) [![npm module downloads per month](http://img.shields.io/npm/dm/function-tools.svg)](https://www.npmjs.org/package/function-tools) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/75lb/function-tools.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/75lb/function-tools) [![Dependency Status](https://david-dm.org/75lb/function-tools.svg)](https://david-dm.org/75lb/function-tools) #function-tools Useful higher-order functions **Example** ```js var f = require("function-tools"); ``` ##f.throttle(f, [options]) Guarantees a function a specified `restPeriod` in between invocations. **Params** - f `function` - the function to throttle - \[options\] `Object` - the options - \[restPeriod\] `number` - a value in ms **Returns**: `function` **Example** ```js var throttled = f.throttle(myFunction, { restPeriod: 200 }); throtted(); // this will only execute if at least 200ms since the last invocation ```
